short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to center subtitles on YouTube videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever felt that subtitles on YouTube videos are out of place or distract you from the main content? With our new Chrome extension, those days are over. Introducing our innovative tool designed to center subtitles on YouTube videos, offering you a more comfortable and distraction-free viewing experience.

Our extension automatically adjusts the position of subtitles, ensuring they are perfectly aligned in the center of the screen. You no longer have to deal with subtitles overlapping important elements of the video or being off-screen. With just a few clicks, you can enjoy your favorite videos with clearly centered subtitles, enhancing readability and immersion in the content.

Moreover, our extension is easy to install and use. Simply add the extension to your Chrome browser, and you'll start enjoying the enhanced viewing experience immediately. Whether you're watching tutorials, movies, or educational videos, our extension ensures that subtitles become a seamless addition to your YouTube viewing experience.
